stories.headline: Voter Fraud: Errant electioneering
stories.summary: Investigation into the Miami mayoral election reveals over 300 problematic votes, including fraudulent absentee ballots and votes from ineligible individuals. The inquiry led to a judge overturning the election results due to extensive voter fraud.

stories.headline: Tech Tip: Enter Intranets
stories.summary: Guidance on setting up an Intranet in newsrooms using TCP/IP networks for easier access to public records, improving efficiency in computer-assisted reporting.
